alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; East Baton Rouge; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Northern Tangipahoa; Southern Livingston; St. Helena (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 4:19PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern St. Helena, Livingston, southwestern Tangipahoa and central East Baton Rouge Parishes through 445 PM CDT... At 419 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Walker, or 7 miles east of Denham Springs, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hammond, Denham Springs, Ponchatoula, Walker, Livingston, French Settlement, Albany, Port Vincent, Springfield, Montpelier, Natalbany and Tickfaw. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 12 between mile markers 11 and 41. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 28 and 40. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Tangipahoa; East Baton Rouge; Lower Tangipahoa; Northern Livingston; Northern Tangipahoa; Southern Livingston; St. Helena
